original_title: 怨霊塔　都市伝説全集の地獄
overview: A mockumentary horror depicting the tragedy of director Kiyotaka Taguchi and Miki Hatano approaching the ruined tower, which is said to be the birthplace of many urban legends such as Yamanishi, Kotoribako, and Kokke-san flying on the Internet.
title: Ghost Tower: A Complete Urban Legend from Hell
